mapper.select: select a.id, a.org_id, a.role_name, a.role_code, role_type, status, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, delete_flag from s_sys_role a left join s_sys_user_role b on a.id = b.role_id where b.user_id = #{userId}
select id, org_id, username, password, phone, email, wx, qq, status, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, delete_flag from s_sys_user where delete_flag = '0' and username = #{username}

select p.id, p.name, p.permission, comment, status, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, delete_flag from s_sys_permission p inner join s_sys_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = p.id where p.delete_flag='0' and rp.role_code in
#{roleCode}
